How does it work with topic `/subt/finish` with multiple robots? Does it hold for a single robot all for the whole group?

I am referring to:

[#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api)

_It's good practice to call the finish service when you are done with a competition run. The finish service will automatically be called when any of the termination criteria are met \(refer to the SubT Challenge rules document\)._ 

I just realized that one of the reason why the simulation is cut in the middle is that one of five simulated robots returned home and called `/subt/finish` … so does it behave that any robot can terminate it? It is not “per robot” correct?
